title: SMS Verification Code Sent
banner: A new security code has been sent to
accessNotification: You’ll be able to access the service with the new code as soon as you receive it.
header1: If you still haven’t received the code
paragraph: If you haven’t got the code yet, make sure that:
listItem2: the mobile phone number we have is correct
listItem3: you wait up to an hour to receive it - during busy periods, texts can be delayed
